definitions: the quality of being plain and straightforward

examples.text: he was renowned for the clarity and directness of his sermons
I like the simplicity and directness of the image

shortDefinitions: quality of being plain and straightforward

definitions: the quality of proceeding in a straight line without deflection

examples.text: despite the directness of the route, the old road was terribly difficult
she had a directness of aim

shortDefinitions: quality of proceeding in straight line without deflection
